channel.title: Politics on Walter Mays
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Walter Mays

item.title: Why Is Crosscheck So Bad? Bayesian Statistics
item.description: It’s June of 2019, and political tensions are at an all-time high. Fear of election fraud, either from fears of hacking or double voting, is widespread on all political sides. Do you know what this country needs? Another hot take on the Interstate Voter Registration Crosscheck system. Background I’ve seen plenty of excellent criticisms leveled at this system. For those of you not familiar with it, the Crosscheck system takes voting records from all participating states, then checks for any duplicate people.
